clinical_study.official_title: DELP for Acute Hemorrhagic Stroke: a Prospective, Random, Open-label, Blind-endpoint, Single Centre, Pilot Study

lead_sponsor.agency: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

clinical_study.source: General Hospital of Shenyang Military Region

brief_summary.textblock: Delipid Extracorporeal Lipoprotein filter from Plasma (DELP) has been found to improve neurological function and life ability of AIS patients and approved for the treatment of AIS by China Food and Drug Administration (CFDA). Our recent study imply that the neuroprotective effect of DELP involved multiple neuroprotective mechanism such as anti-inflammation, free radical scavenging, and decreasing MMP-9. Based on the multiple mechanisms, we argue that DELP may exert neuroprotective effect on acute cerebral hemorrhage.

clinical_study.why_stopped: the research sponsors stopped further funding due to a planning of a multi-center trial
